snippet: Hormel, maker of Spam and Dinty Moore stew, reported a record second-quarter profit despite the avian flu scourge.
abstract: Hormel reports record second-quarter profit of $180.2 million, despite battling costly avian flu epidemic; revenue of $2.28 billion falls short of analyst expectations.
lead_paragraph: Hormel, maker of Spam and Dinty Moore stew, reported a record second-quarter profit despite the avian flu scourge.

headline.print_headline: Hormel Posts Record Profit Despite Bird Flu Outbreak
headline.main: Hormel Posts Record Profit Despite Bird Flu Outbreak
